patthana22.35:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.35:5.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa … pe … adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.35:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana22.35:7.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.

patthana22.35:35.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.35:36.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
